name: Watch Your Back
summary: You menace the target, stoking their fears and drawing their attention.
description:
You menace the target, stoking their fears and drawing their attention. Attempt an Intimidation check against the Will DC of a target within 30 feet. If you succeed, for 1 minute, that target gains a +2 status bonus to Perception checks against you, but they take a â€“2 status penalty to Will saves against fear effects.Traits

Emotion: This effect alters a creature's emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.

Fear: Fear effects evoke the emotion of fear. Effects with this trait always have the mental and emotion traits as well.Mental: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.
